ResourceHeader.Description: Variometers: Torsion magnetometers (H,D and Z components). Absolute Instruments: Vector proton precession magnetometer (H, Z and F) (1964 - 1975) Standard magnetometer (D, I, H and Z) proposed by E.A. Johnson (1939) (1958 - 1975). Schmidt's magnetic theodolite (D and H) and Schmidt's earth-inductor (I) (1930 - 1957). Wild-Edelmann's declinometer (D and H) and Wild-Edelmann's earth-inductor (I) (1913 - 1947).
